directions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes. Stir curry powder into the onion mixture; cook 1 minute more. Remove from heat to cool.
Blend onion mixture, yogurt, chutney, and parsley in a food processor and blend until smooth.
title: Curried Mango Chutney Dip
